title: Narva
summary: Narva (Estonian pronunciation: [ˈnɑrʋɑ]) is a municipality and city in Estonia.  It is located in Ida-Viru County, at the eastern extreme point of Estonia, at the Russian border, on the Narva River which drains Lake Peipus. The city of Narva is the country's third largest after Tallinn and Tartu.
